ComicInfo.Title: A Green Thumb; Reflection Affection; The Escort; Ice Follies; Twist of Fate; Group Gripe; Pound for Pound; Bugging the Bee!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Reggie tries to trick Moose into thinking the plant he is growing is a money tree.
Nobody believes that Reggie actually knows famous movie star Tom Crowes.
After losing to Reggie in an ice skating race, Archie gets Dilton to sharpen his skates.
Moose is a menace.
Reggie is the star of the Archies.
switching weights
When a flu epidemic keeps Miss Grundy absent, Mr. Weatherbee fills in for her and has to deal with the antics of Reggie.
ComicInfo.Characters: Moose Mason,Waldo Weatherbee,Betty Cooper,Pop Tate,Reggie Mantle,Mr. Svenson,Professor Flutesnoot,Ethel Muggs
ComicInfo.Writer: Joe Edwards,George Gladir,Frank Doyle,Hal Smith,Joe Edwards,George Gladir,Frank Doyle,Hal Smith
ComicInfo.Inker: Harvey Mercadoocasio,Rudy Lapick,Pat Kennedy,Harvey Mercadoocasio,Rudy Lapick,Pat Kennedy
